summary: Clark and Ellen Griswold embark on a trip to visit their son Rusty and his family, but along the way, Clark has planned a romantic getaway where everything turns to disaster.
cast: Chevy Chase|Beverly D'Angelo|Meade Nichol|Robert Lewis Stephenson|Bruce Fine|Travis Greer|Alina Phelan|Ellodee Carpenter|Lilli Birdsell|James Hyde|Karen Y. McClain|James Bannon|Caley Chase|Glenn Rockowitz|David Scully|Matt McCain|Hunter Buch
title: Hotel Hell Vacation
